articles.title: Bayer to remove 'cancer-causing' herbicide ingredient in US - but not yet in SA - News24
articles.description: In about a year, US consumers will be able to buy glyphosate-free Roundup herbicide for their homes and gardens, but the contentious active ingredient will continue to be included in the product used in South Africa.
articles.content:
• Bayer's 'Roundup' weedkiller contains glyphosate as its main active ingredient.
